summary: A passionate and dedicated professional with more than five years of experience in the fields of law, linguistics and interpretation.

experience.title: Driver
experience.description: Welcomed customers, assisted with transportation planning, and performed basic car maintenance including battery changes and tire changes.

experience.title: Server
experience.description: Greeted customers, managed seating, took orders, and worked to ensure customer satisfaction and retention; ensured menu availability and proper condition; escorted guests to seats.

experience.title: Relation Officer
experience.description: Compiled information for reports and filed documents for distribution to related offices and provinces. Traveled weekly to provinces to assess the situation of each area and draft reports; assisted manager with administrative duties.

experience.title: Translator, Legal and Cultural Advisor / International Security Assistant
experience.description: Provided live translation between Farsi (Dari), Pashto, and English for American military personnel in official meetings; translated confidential government/military documents; maintained confidentiality; kept management informed through recordkeeping.

experience.title: Case Researcher
experience.description: Provided holistic case management services; maintained a caseload of families; met with clients weekly; input data into the agency database.

experience.title: English Instructor
experience.company: English Language Center Puli Khumri, Afghanistan
experience.description: Instructed English as a Second Language; prepared lesson plans and homework; prepared monitoring reports; participated in professional development.

experience.title: Legal Aid
experience.description: Provided legal aid to civil societies, NGOs and individuals; communicated legal concepts in layman's terms; coordinated with government bodies to ensure action against child abuse; prepared reports and drafts.

experience.title: Service
experience.description: Conducted seminars and presentations on small family size, health education and financial literacy; supported social service programs; aided relief and rehabilitation during calamities.

certifications: Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) - Aptech Learning Institution
